description: Randy Rock is sleeping his night off in his bedroom. Hazy are the memories from the night before, but he seems to recall a few things. So he starts by massaging his throbbing cock, running his hands all over his chiseled body, flexing and stroking for your amusement. Enjoy!
title: Randy Rock
